title: Danú Bag gives hydration packs a new look for your daily commute
content:
Want to wear a hydration pack to explore your city but want something that will blend in when you hit the town? Danú Bag is here to help. The startup melds hydration functionality with urban style designed to fit in at the coffee shop, museum, cocktail lounge, and wherever else your night takes you. And […]

The post Danú Bag gives hydration packs a new look for your daily commute appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
